name: Cool Guy Teaches Math - Chapter 1: The Six Missing Assignments
name_original: Cool Guy Teaches Math - Chapter 1: The Six Missing Assignments
description:
School has ended, but you realize you left something at school, your HOMEWORK! You must enter the school, and find all six of your homework assignments. But be careful, because your math teacher, cool guy, is wandering the school halls, looking for kids after hours. Try to avoid him as much as possible or he'll  j̶̨̋͐̔ǒ̵̗̽̅́̽j̷̡̡̬̜̑̀̂̂́ ̶̨̱̫͔̹̇̉͊̅͝ȟ̴̘͈̃͂̀̑ḯ̶̡̢̼̫̄̋̈́̚s̶̢̬̲̘͖̅͗ ̴̡͉͍͐̿̕s̶͍̼͔͘f̵̦͎͓̋d̷̜͌̽́̈́̽u̵͔͙̭̮͑̄̏͊e̴̘̠̔̇͘3̸̦̯̥̰̄͂͒̐̊ͅ8̸̟̲̓̎̐8̷͚̹̰̤̿̏͝ ̸̢̢̱͔̱̂̒͑̚'̸͖̜̤̗̋͗́͛̃w̸̖͐̿̑̒̈́͜ .

This Game was inspired by Micah McGonigal (mystman12)'s Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning. Created by Pinnacle Games.
